properties.areaDesc: Alenuihaha Channel; Maalaea Bay; Big Island Southeast Waters; Pailolo Channel; Big Island Leeward Waters
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued November 1 at 3:31AM HST expiring November 4 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu HI
properties.description:
Trade winds will increase as the pressure gradient tightens
across the area.
The National Weather Service in Honolulu has issued a Small Craft
Advisory, which is in effect from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM HST
Sunday.

* Winds and Seas...East winds 20 to 25 kt, with higher gusts.
Seas 5 to 8 feet.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that winds speeds of 25 to 33 knots
and/or seas 10 feet or greater are expected to produce conditions
hazardous to small craft. Inexperienced mariners, especially
those operating smaller vessels, should avoid navigating in these
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM HST SUNDAY

title: Current watches, warnings, and advisories for Pacific Islands marine zones
